member.name: SecPkgContext_SessionInfo
member.summary: Specifies whether the session is a reconnection and retrieves a value that identifies the session.

summary.para: Bit flags that specify the type of session. The following value is defined.

member.name: SecPkgContext_SessionInfo.cbSessionId
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the rgbSessionId array.

member.name: SecPkgContext_SessionInfo.rgbSessionId
member.summary: An array of up to 32 bytes that identifies the session.
